Language: Hindi
Genre:  Comedy
Run Time - 1 Hr. 57 Min
Cast: Vishnu Manchu, Genelia D'Souza, Srihari, Brahmanandam
Director: Sreenu Vaitla
Babloo (Vishnu Manchu) likes to have fun and is always getting in trouble. So his father Narayana (Chandra Mohan) gets him a job with Shanker Goud (Srihari). Shanker Goud and Bhallu are rivals and Bhallu is determined to kill Shanker Goud's sister Pooja (Genelia D'Souza). Babloo falls in love with Pooja but Shanker is planning an arranged marriage for her with Ajay (Akash). Babloo and Pooja elope to get married
